[[inst_hl_prf]]
==== HL.PRF

*Syntax:* hl.prf{.l1,.l2,.l3} [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw,.neg}><<<shamt>]

*Description:* Long (48-bit) instruction encoding.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_prf.svg[HL.PRF encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* LDA

*Compression:* HL48 (len=48)

*Uop-Class payload:* `{"agu_kind": "LDA", "note": "User confirmed A", "source": "group_rule", "uop_kind": "AGU"}`
